itemDescription: English-Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Ronald "Ron" Morgan (born 21 January 1936) is an English-born Welsh rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Ebbw Vale, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Great Britain and Wales, and at club level for Swinton and Leeds (Heritage No.) as prop, or second-row, i.e. numbers 8 or 10, or, 11 or 12, during the era of contested scrums.

response: Bill Morgan was the father of the rugby union and rugby league footballer; Ronald Morgan.
